resources.string: This device does not support this property
This device does not support effects
Insufficient permission or missing resources. If you have questions, please contact your sales rep.
Beauty parameters are illegal, please check the parameter settings

The current package does not include this feature.
The current project\'s package type is %s, Please use %s

After enabling High Performance Mode, the beauty effects will consume fewer system CPU/GPU/memory resources, which can reduce phone overheating and lag, making it more suitable for prolonged use on low-end devices.

After enabling High Performance Mode, the following beauty features will be unavailable:
1. Face: Face shape, Jawline reduction, Wrinkle removal, Nasolabial fold removal. Only the "Natural Face Slimming" mode will be retained in face slimming.
2. Eyes: Eye width, Eye height, Eye position, Eye bag removal.
3. Eyebrows: Angle, Distance, Height, Length, Thickness, Eyebrow peak.
4. Mouth: Smile lips.
5. Beauty and Makeup: Beauty-black, Hair dyeing.
6. Nose: Nose Bridge、Nasion.

It is recommended to enable High Performance Mode on low-end devices.
To determine whether the current device is low-end or mid-to-high-end, you can use the following interfaces:
Android: getDeviceLevel method of XmagicApi
iOS: getDeviceLevel method of XMagic
The demo does not support scanning qrcode

The filters and animated stickers that need to be downloaded in this demo app are only intended for use in Tencent Effect Demo. Please replace them with your own resources before experiencing the app.
Smart beauty\nmatching weak beauty and makeup effects for men and babies
Face occlusion detection\nPrevent makeup to be displayed on occluded objects.
